abstract: One of the few well documented cases of cerebellar glioblastoma multiforme in an adult is reported. In addition, to our knowledge, it is the first reported case in which the angiographic, pneumoencephalographic, nuclear scan and CAT data have been correlated. In this case the CAT scan proved the most sensitive in the demonstration of tumor.
title: Cerebellar glioblastoma multiforme in an adult.
